title: Everyone im put against is better then me
body: Every single game past level 15 has been my team shit talking me because im worse then them. I consitantly go around 0-4 / 10 and its really discouraging.

replies.body:
If you start out just crushing people the system will put you against better people. This is how league works at its core. Youll get higher and higher mmr until you peak and thats where you should be winning 50% of your games. If you just started and win 68% of your games then you are doing amazing. Dont take losses as a bad experience. If someone is flat out whooping you, watch a replay and see what they did. Some people are better at farming, macro, mechanics, and all sorts of little things that when added together make you a good player.
Dont get discouraged. Nobody should be winning as many games as you have if theyre new. If anything you might just be a natural at this game.

You have only had 2 games in the last 18 days where you got no kills, and you have a 68% win rate.

You are getting better so you are playing against better people, which will cause your own skill to rise over time.

If you want to play some games together so I can help you out, add me in game. My in game name is the same as here.
Think about it this way, you learn more in the games you lose than the games you win.
